'''Tides Will Guide You Home (I)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (I)]]''. The achievements are earned by following [[Seelie]] in the [[Court of Fontaine]] Region, [[Belleau]] Region, and [[Beryl]] Region.
